## Public Member Functions

### getNextRewritableSource() {#af67bc5de34066daeefa8468bc983e737}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;PeepholeOptimizer.cpp&#125;::RegSequenceRewriter::getNextRewritableSource (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp; Src, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a16005492b382a6a76abae848b4af2b83">RegSubRegPair</a> &amp; Dst)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>

<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a3fa829354b3f8b782d40175469540cab">Rewriter::getNextRewritableSource()</a> Here <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a> has the following form: dst = REG&#95;SEQUENCE Src1.src1SubIdx, subIdx1, Src2.src2SubIdx, subIdx2. Each call will return a different source, walking all the <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a40cc6a0e0895fa564ee013923209aa85">available</a> source.
</SectionUser>

The first call returns: (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) = (Src1, src1SubIdx). (DstReg, DstSubReg) = (dst, subIdx1).

The second call returns: (SrcReg, SrcSubReg) = (Src2, src2SubIdx). (DstReg, DstSubReg) = (dst, subIdx2).

And so on, until all the sources have been traversed, then it returns false.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/peepholeoptimizer-cpp/#l00404">404</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/peepholeoptimizer-cpp">PeepholeOptimizer.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### RewriteCurrentSource() {#ad1e6780b2cde967f55f56868b46c01a1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;PeepholeOptimizer.cpp&#125;::RegSequenceRewriter::RewriteCurrentSource (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> NewReg, unsigned NewSubReg)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
Rewrite the current source with <code>NewReg</code> and <code>NewSubReg</code> if possible.

<SectionUser title="Returns">
True if the rewriting was possible, false otherwise.
</SectionUser>
